fullplot: Lifelong friends Deco and Naldinho, who own a small steaming boat in Bahia, meet strip-dancer Karinna. Both men fall for her and their friendship is deeply shattered.
plot: Lifelong friends Deco and Naldinho, who own a small steaming boat in Bahia, meet strip-dancer Karinna. Both men fall for her and their friendship is deeply shattered.
title: Lower City

tomatoes.consensus: This familiar story of a tension-fraught love triangle wavers between brutality and steamy sex.
